entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
